CustomField.description: Enter the keyword or keywords here so that, when those keywords are entered into a search on the PKB, this article will appear at the top of the search results as a recommended article.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the keyword or keywords here so that, when those keywords are entered into a search on the PKB, this article will appear at the top of the search results as a recommended article.
CustomField.label: Keyword
